comfy-beds.command.onlyPlayer: This command is only allowed to be run by a player.
comfy-beds.command.onlyOnBed: Run this command while sleeping to set your spawn.
comfy-beds.chatMessage.normal: Use a bed to set your spawn.
comfy-beds.chatMessage.shiftClick: Use the bed while sneaking to set your spawn.
comfy-beds.chatMessage.normalClick: Use the bed while sneaking to sleep without setting your spawn.
